ComicInfo.Title: Clan-Building Chapter Two: The Journey
ComicInfo.Summary: Part 2 of the 2 issue Re-introduction of the Manhattan Gargoyle Clan, the story retells the last "canon" Gargoyles Episode "The Journey" Public debate over the Gargoyle menace rages on New York’s airwaves. While the shadowy Quarrymen take matters into their own hands, having declared all out war on Gargoyle kind. Goliath and Elisa must fight for their very lives, chased along the rooftops of Manhattan. Will an injured Goliath be able to get himself and Elisa to safety before he becomes the Quarrymen’s first victim?
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-13 11:48:12. [CVDB105351]
ComicInfo.Characters: Alexander Xanatos, Angela, Broadway, Bronx, Brooklyn, David Xanatos, Elisa Maza, Fox, Goliath, Hudson, John Castaway, Lexington, MacBeth, Margot Yale, Puck, Vinnie Grigori
ComicInfo.Locations: 23ed Precinct Clock Tower, Eyrie Building, Manhattan, New York City
